glosses: to deny ("inkar etmek" more than any other synonym of the word, can have a connotation that the denial is false or in vain. See quote "He denied his feelings.")

examples.text: ... inkâr etti. Duygularını inkâr etti. Hatta deneyimlerini inkâr etti. Gördüklerini, işittiklerini unutma arzusuyla inkâr etti. Balık hafızalı bir varoluşu seçerek kapasitesini, potansiyelini inkâr etti. Politikacılar problemleri inkâr ...
examples.translation: He denied it. He denied his feelings. He even denied his experiences. He denied what he saw and heard with the desire to forget it. By choosing an hare-brained (attention span of a fish) existence denied its capacity and potential. Politicians deny problems

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish انكار ایتمك (inkâr etmek)
